website_summaries.verdict: An attractive pole design with star detail that stands out among more basic-looking models.
pros: Strong and sturdy cast iron construction is heavy-duty with a quality feel to it
Can withstand high winds as long as the holding bracket is installed correctly
Includes anti-slip clip to hold flag in place
cons: Reports that the powder-coated finish is thin and prone to chipping easily

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I had previously bought the cheap thin aluminum poles that separates in the middle and they are terrible. I bought this hoping it would be better, and it is way better quality. The only thing keeping my review from being 5 stars is that it only comes with one clip at the top for a flag with grommets. I had to buy a set of clips separately. It shipped and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Attractive.  Fleur De Lis is Metal.  Looks great.  Super Price.
customer_reviews.text: Being from New Orleans, I wanted a nice Fleur De Lis design and this is. Hard to get, I have three of the plain ball finials in black. I was so pleased. It does not bother me that the attachment devices are plastic, they have been sturdy enough to withstand a direct hit from Andrew. Wrapping is a problem, when I figure a solution to this I will let you know. I think maybe just lengthening the metal grommet attachments might do the trick, i will think on this. This is a solid company. I will write a follow up in three months.
customer_reviews.author: James C. Allen, FIPF 2016.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Flag pole
customer_reviews.text: It's a good sturdy flag pole.. I fly it in the bed of my truck with a 3x5 POW/MIA flag and it does great!! Nice touch with the star on top also. Comes with a swivel mount at top so you will need to buy another mounting ring. I bought the Valley Forge 1 inch diameter rotating mounting rings to go with it. Works out good
customer_reviews.author: keneo

customer_reviews.title: Had to repaint out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: I love this flagpole and the overall quality of the pole itself is good...but the paint is terrible. When I removed the pole from box it came in , it had several areas that the paint was coming off. You can scratch it off easily with you fingernail. So I sanded it down, primed it and repainted it. What a shame to have to do this to a new product, but when they are made in China, this is usually the case.
customer_reviews.author: dfhensley

customer_reviews.title: Unique and Classy! Good Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great product with a unique and classic design. It isn't too showy, lets the flag stand out, but the star on top is charming enough to get compliments. The usual and common white pole with gold ball finial isn't our style, and when we found this we knew it was the one! The product itself is made with high quality material. We mounted it to our house with the Evergreen Cast Iron Bronze Finish flag mount. We did end up buying an additional set of flag pole swivel rings (black) after reading reviews about this one swivel attachment you get on the pole with purchase. Overall, great product, we love it! It isn't something you can find easily anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pole but not the one I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Using this in front of my RV 5th Wheel. It seems sturdy so far. The upper and lower anti-tangle rings are made of plastic with a cheap clips. The top one still gets tangled so I ordered a set of rings that someone on here recommended. I ordered the Star one as it was different than the others I have seen on Amazon.. BUT, Amazon shipped me the wrong one. I received the Fleur and not the Star. I needed to use it so I did not send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: great flag pole! especially for saints fans. #whodat
customer_reviews.text: bought this as a gift for my dad & mom for their home. their flag pole was literally being held together by duct tape & they would not replace it. we're all from louisiana & are also saints fans & they love to hang their saints flag during football season, so the fleur de lis design was perfect. dad had it up on the side of the house & assembled within minutes. he's 80. flagpole is easy to understand. no assembly needed. got it out of the box, adjusted length as needed, attached flag, put on the house. very sturdy construction. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. Scott

customer_reviews.title: I DO NOT like it
customer_reviews.text: Every morning my husband has to untangle the flag and my husband is very handy and installed it correctly it looks nice but don't buy it i regret buying it our neighbor, also very handy ,could not figure out a solution either ,to keep the flag from tangling Every morning ,i say "Did you untangle the flag ?"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: STURDY FLAG POLE!
customer_reviews.text: I have went through many, I mean many flag poles before I found this one. I love to show my Texas pride and this pole can withstand heavy 40-50 MPH winds no bull. The flags will flap around but will stay on this pole just tighten it down with some locktite and you are good to go! Dont hesitate if you are looking to save money buy this as you will go through ten cheapo aluminum flag poles instead of this one. I have had mine for over 4 years with no bend in it, just get a solid base and long screws and this will never give you any frustration. Enjoy! J from South Texas
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, strong, 1 inch x 56 inch, flag pole!
customer_reviews.text: We got this over a year ago, & it is still looking new. My husband hangs his huge, heavy, flag on it, and it has not bent or come loose at all. We get a lot of wind, and this is the best pole we have bought. It is hung from the porch support, in a windy location. We got the matching holder to go with it. It looks nice, no rust after over a year. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Meeeeeeeeeew

customer_reviews.title: Flag constantly snags!
customer_reviews.text: This flag pole suffers from bad design. Simply put, the top carabiner doesn't spin freely because the plastic piece next to it slides down on the pole, snagging the flag from spinning over. I highly recommend getting a flag pole that has two secure flag pole rings at the top and bottom of the flag pole!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: Fairly nice flag pole
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to let others know that while some reviews on this flag pole indicate it only came with a clip at the top, mine did come with two clips. So a flag that attaches with two grommets, rather than one that goes on via a sleeve, will attach to this. That said, the pole doesn't seem all that sturdy. I'm sure we will need to replace it within a few years, as seems to be the case with most products these days. In the meantime, it does look nice when viewed from the sidewalk.
customer_reviews.author: S. Durham

customer_reviews.title: Great pole
customer_reviews.text: I got this to attach to my lamp post to fly the American flag. It’s very sturdy, easy to extend etc and stays closed when you get to correct length. I kinda wish the top part that holds the clip for the top grommet on the flag was metal also As the one for the bottom is a very substantial metal. I can see perhaps after repeated winds we get out here and our cold winters that maybe would crack. We shall see.
customer_reviews.author: susieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I have bronze light fixtures and wanted something to match that. Purchased this along with the flag here on Amazon, and I love my American flag. I’m a 39 year old female, and never before in my life have I been so patriotic, political, saddened or furious with the state of affairs. The pole is very sturdy and the dark bronze fleur de lis fits my home perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Aria M

customer_reviews.title: Much better than plastic
customer_reviews.text: We had purchased the flagpoles with the plastic attachments before and they were junk as they fell apart in about a year. Rather than paying $20 plus each every year, we just got a couple of these for our flags and they are doing much better! I ordered some metal attachments to clip the flag on while allowing it to turn and it seems to be working really well, plus has the cute star on the end. We are satisfied customers.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal H

customer_reviews.title: Fixed it...no hang up.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Well made. Regarding the reviews about the flag getting wrapped up, here is the fix. Loosen the lower swivel by loosening the thumb screw. Let it rotate freely. I also applied light oil to the upper swivel so there is less friction on the pole. That alone didn’t fix it, so do both. Ours just survived a big storm and it hangs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Love the star and color but quality isn't there...
customer_reviews.text: This pole is not very sturdy for our flag. It's holding up in the summer ok, but I doubt it's going to survive a windstorm. The amount of distance it actually can extend based on the stickers on it, isn't really the full length we needed, like the description states. We are making it work with a 3x5 flag but we honestly expected much better quality from this flag pole. The "tangle free" clips also don't work very well, our flag is tangled most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Flag Pole Will be Perfect for Memorial Day!
customer_reviews.text: This flag pole is beautiful! (Something I thought I would never say hahaaa... sighhh when did I become my mother?!?) It does stink that it only fits flags with the sleeve style, but hopefully the additional bracket things that I ordered arrive in time for Memorial Day. Will update if anything negative occurs i.e. rust, doesn't hold up to weather etc. EDIT: Originally left a negative review because it didn't fit the 1" bracket we already had. Bought a brand new 1" bracket from a box store, and it fits perfectly. I can't explain it.
customer_reviews.author: E H

customer_reviews.title: Quality item... Just not the one I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have with this flag pole, is that it is not the STAR one that I ordered. They sent a fleur design instead of the star... I needed it to display our flag for a last minute event/photos in front of our house, so I was forced to install what came, or nothing at all. I installed it, and it is nice looking, just not what I had wanted and paid for. I also happened to find it at a lower price a few days later, at Hartville Hardware in Ohio... Oops.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but top rotator is no good
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you have a can of flat black rustoleum on hand to fix any scratches... Also, as other reviews say, bottom clamp unit is good rotating one, but the top is just the plastic piece, so the flip over mechanism doesn’t work. If this is a problem you need to go buy another rotating piece. They might be supply the top piece as such because at the tip the pole diameter shrinks to accommodate the screw in star piece...
customer_reviews.author: Misa

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Decorative Touch and Great Color!
customer_reviews.text: Classic black powder coat finish that goes nicely with the wrought iron trim on our garage door. The star finial on the top is a great touch. The material is well made, and fit our existing wall-mount flag pole holder perfectly. It looks much better than the plastic gold finish eagles that you normally find on the end of flagpoles. (Which tends to fade over time.). I look forward to seeing how this one holds up, but thus far am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi W

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much I bought a second one
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of constantly buying the wooden flag poles so I decided to invest in one of these last year. It's very sturdy and looks great especially when displaying the United States flag. I like it so much, I bought another one recently to put in my backyard for my garden flags. I also bought some of the 1 inch black rotating flag mounting rings so it can hold the United States flag. The flag still gets tangled but not like with the wooden polls.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Fleur-de-lis flagpole
customer_reviews.text: I’m loving my new Fleur-de-lis flagpole! I had a wood look plastic flag pole previously which broke. This one is beautiful, sturdy and has clasps to hold the flag in two places . Overall I’m very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Helsel

customer_reviews.title: Durable, functional and pretty too!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and easy to install. I’m not sure if the pole is longer than average poles, or if the flag I ordered is smaller than most, because my flag keeps wrapping around the pole. I like the star on the end too-this prevents the flag from blowing loose on windy days. And since we live on a mountain, we have LOTS of windy days!
customer_reviews.author: kpcpfam

customer_reviews.title: Broke Ring
customer_reviews.text: We like the pole itself, it seems sturdy enough for our 5 ft. flag whipping in the wind. NOT GOOD...the ring that holds the bottom end of the flag broke in 2 places and a 3rd spot is going to break with a bit more use. ONLY IN USE FOR A WEEK in winds at 10 miles an hour give or take a few.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette F

customer_reviews.title: Very short flag pole, not normal size
customer_reviews.text: Pole was MUCH shorter than expected, so flag always gets stuck on porch railing. If it was 6 or 8 inches longer, like a normal flag pole should be, would have done the job. My fault for just assuming this was a normal, standard sized pole. Next time I will read the description more throughly.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Golas

customer_reviews.title: The swivel rings I bought to attach the flag on the bottom of the pole work great, but the one you provide on top sucks
customer_reviews.text: I would give it five stars if my flag didn't keep hanging up on the top. The swivel rings I bought to attach the flag on the bottom of the pole work great, but the one you provide on top sucks. So I'm going to see if I can snap it off and maybe fit one of the good ones I have on it so that when the wind blows the flag stays looking sharp instead of all tangled up. Other than that, it's a very cute pole.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Shipped and delivered on time. However one of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipped and delivered on time. However one of the two small screws that holds the top to the pole itself was in the bottom.of the box. I tried to put it back on but the hole.was stripped out. The black coated finish is chipped off around top as well. Thus is not shipping damage, its a defect in manufacturing. If the person that put this in the box had looked at this for five seconds before throwing thos in the box this would have been avoided.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this flag pole, it it’s beautiful, and adds a certain appeal to the home. The flag pole is very sturdy, and easy to expand. The top of the pole seems very well made, and won’t be snapping off. I have had this over a week now, and it’s already made it through two storms?
customer_reviews.author: Lee Stahley

customer_reviews.title: Could have been made better
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have with this flag pool is the cheap top spindle that always gets stuck on the pool. They used a outstanding spindle for the bottom but for the top it's a single price of plastic which gets stuck on the post staff. Frustrating!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty - seems solid
customer_reviews.text: Very very pretty but the flag keeps catching. If I could figure out how to make that stop; I would be thrilled and give it a solid 5 stars. This is the first flagpole I have bought - so I could be doing something wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Kc

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Thin Aluminum Pole
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was ordering a cast iron or heavy duty metal flagpole, but when it arrived today (7/6/2020) it was clearly not that at all. The pole is cheap aluminum, with a heavier cast iron type topper that was bent when I opened it. I also paid 30 bucks for this pole just a few days ago but now it's listed for $21.99. I also only received 1 flag ring clip instead of 2. Overall, disappointed in purchase and cannot recommend it due to quality of material and paying more than I should have for it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnora

customer_reviews.title: Not a great experience.
customer_reviews.text: I did not keep this product. The product arrived incomplete. The bottom cap was missing. Reordered it and the wrong item showed up. Perhaps it had more to do with the vendor and not the product.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Howard

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Flagpole but needs a second hook
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that I dislike about the pole is that there is only 1 hook on it for hanging your flag. You need 2 hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hagerman

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: There is no way to lock the pole in place once you extend it. Not sure if I got a faulty pole or what.
customer_reviews.author: emily e.

customer_reviews.title: A Match
customer_reviews.text: This Matched my Flag Pole Holder and in itself just as Sturdy as the Holder for my Front Porch. It has a Great snap for the Front that keeps the Flags from slipping down the pole in the wind!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Vermette

customer_reviews.title: Nice flag pole; all metal; but recommend painting before installing
customer_reviews.text: The paint finish is thin enough you can scrape it off with your fingernail. I repainted the flag pole and applied a clear coat for durability. Also, only one mating ring comes with the flag pole (not sure why) so you'll need the Valley Forge Flag 1-Inch Diameter Rotating Mounting Rings, 2-Piece in addition. Otherwise I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: DLC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but the extras do not work
customer_reviews.text: What makes this adjustable broke the second time i used it. Also the top ring that allows the flag to freely spin does not work. It is beautiful though. We had to tape it up so it would stay where we needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S

customer_reviews.title: Practicle and decorative at the same time.
customer_reviews.text: I really do like my Fleur de Lis flag pole. I bought it to display various flags and one, the Scottish Royal flag has a Fleur de Lis in it. Perfect. If you need a flag pole for your deck or porch this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Richo

customer_reviews.title: pole 's extender would not stay in place
customer_reviews.text: We had to go to the hardware store and buy another flag pole This one would not keep the extension rod in place. There were no instructions except a small diagram which was on the pole. My husband is an engineer and could not keep the pole from slipping down. I would have returned it but I had already thrown out the box.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Silver

customer_reviews.title: OK but disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty pole but was disappointed I had to order and wait for another pole ring for the bottom. It does not come with 2! Crazy! I was excited to get it and put it up and then couldn't because there is only one clip. You have to have two clips to put up a flag! :(
customer_reviews.author: fayers

customer_reviews.title: Bent like a straw overnight.
customer_reviews.text: I appreciated the looks of the product but the strength of the material was extremely lacking. It was less than a month after I installed it on the front of my house before it decided to cash in. I pulled out of my garage one morning and saw it just hanging there. Fortunately Old Glory hadn't fallen to the ground or I would have been doubly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Davina Bieniek

customer_reviews.title: Only one clip
customer_reviews.text: Has a clip and ring on the top part to connect to the grommet in the flag, but nothing else, so there is no way to clip the bottom grommet of the flag. We ended up just using a zip tie. Otherwise looks okay, but the finish is easily scratched, revealing the metal beneath, so be careful with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Could be better.
customer_reviews.text: The cast iron star is adorable! How ever the pole feels and looks cheeply mad next to it. It only came with one flag clip I had to use a zip tie on the bottom of my flag until I could purchase flag clips.
customer_reviews.author: Gunn Family

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order it ...!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to use this to fly the American Flag since it’s supposed to be a flag pole.. however when I received the item half of the pole was missing the part that “extends.. what a joke...!
customer_reviews.author: John Ziegelmann

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: When this flag pole arrived, it was better than expected. This is the 2nd one I've purchased. I have some other wrought-iron iron items on my porch, so this flag pole matches my theme. It is very sturdy and the pole and star are all one unit. This means the star portion will not accidently come loose on a windy day. I am so glad I came across it when shopping. Definitely would recommend again! Thanks. 😄
customer_reviews.author: SueZQ's favorite flowers!

customer_reviews.title: The star topper will rip up your flag.
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality item and durable. But with the star topper, our flag got ripped up when wind blew it around the pole and flag was ripped up by the five sharp points of the star. Just something to keep in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hocker

customer_reviews.title: Just as described!
customer_reviews.text: I’m going to use this as an upright in ground flag pole. It’s a beautiful Fleur de Lis on the end. It’s easy to expand and retract to the perfect height.
customer_reviews.author: PSchwandtAZ

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Took a while for me to decide which one to get. This one is perfect for the job. Stood up to several bad storms (Boston) and shows no signs of wear. Glad I chose this one. I did have to lube up the bearings so they could spin easier, if you don't your flag will wrap the pole.
customer_reviews.author: Dan M.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed :(
customer_reviews.text: Loved the idea of it and bought it based off of all the good reviews. Ordered two and only got one. The one I got won’t even stay extended.
customer_reviews.author: bernie

customer_reviews.title: Good flagpole
customer_reviews.text: Appear to be good quality. Needed to adjust flag attachments several times to get flag to move freely and not wrap around pole.
customer_reviews.author: gato

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look of the flag pool especially the star. Sadly, the threading to attach the star was stripped upon arrival and the star could not be attached. It was missing parts that would prevent our flag from wrapping around the pole too. Be sure to open your box right away. I didn't and the box looked just fine when it arrived but appears to be a broken returned item that was sent to me.
customer_reviews.author: Noskobibble

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, need to buy second clip and a bracket.
customer_reviews.text: Nice appearance, sturdy. I put this pole on a good quality black metal bracket on the front corner of the driveway side of my house about 4 months ago. The driveway gets a lot of wind, especially during storms and I'm not seeing any signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: MPH

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: Since I installed this product it has fallen out of the holder twice. It seems that the pole material is soft and no matter how much I tighten the retaining screw it works it way loose and falls off. The last time if fell off the star broke off.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Chaffin

customer_reviews.title: I highly doubt this was damaged during shipping since it was packaged fine and the box was not crushed
customer_reviews.text: Pole was dented from bottom to about 4 inches up which would have prevented it from going into the flag pole post. Turned out to be OK for me since I planed on cutting it down a bit to shorten it since I had a smaller flag I was putting on it but still... lacking quality control before shipping. I highly doubt this was damaged during shipping since it was packaged fine and the box was not crushed.
customer_reviews.author: Ken M.

customer_reviews.title: gets tangled constantly
customer_reviews.text: nice except the flag is always getting wrapped around the pole because the rings that are supposed to keep it hanging properly, don't spin freely.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Lancenese

customer_reviews.title: good product, but beat up
customer_reviews.text: and the packaging was fine...it was all scratched up before it went in the box; returned for full refund
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and very nice looking. I highly recommend this for anyone looking for a very well-made flag pole!
customer_reviews.author: Scott McGough

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Looked for a flag pole that could withstand adverse weather conditions and this has been exactly what we wanted! It has held through many rain storms and windy days without any bends or issue. Highly recommend this pole.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Handsome flag pole
customer_reviews.text: The star is a nice touch and the pole itself is sturdy. Held up with a flag that was left out all week with 35 mph wind gusts. Pairs well with the cast iron mount by Evergreen.
customer_reviews.author: Net Tech

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but not packaged well. Broken Piece
customer_reviews.text: It is very sturdy, however a plastic piece came broken into pieces. Wasn't protected or packaged very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Star is just perfect on this pole
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy that I found this flag pole when my old one broke. The star on top really adds charm... it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Lily

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for displaying house flag
customer_reviews.text: This is durable, easy to use, and reasonably priced. It still looks good, and doing its job!
customer_reviews.author: The D.

customer_reviews.title: Spinners aren't the best, flag gets tangled
customer_reviews.text: It's really pretty but my flash keeps tangling. Purchased in the hope it would keep my flag straight but it mostly doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Flag pole is of good quality and description was correct
customer_reviews.text: Flag pole is of good quality and description was correct, but I didn't realize it was this short....the pole I was replacing is 72 inches, a full foot longer...wish this pole came in the longer length! Love the star and it looks so nice with my US Flag....
customer_reviews.author: Paige Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Nice flag pole
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something different than the ordinary wooden flag pole. This is dark metal with a star at the top. Very nice. Just wish it was a little longer. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: JRZGRL

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful flagpole, not durable
customer_reviews.text: I would rate it five stars for the look of the flagpole, it really is beautiful. However, the durability is very poor. We had a storm come through one night and rip off the fleur de lis at the top of the flagpole and there was no way to reattach it. I was disappointed, but the pole itself was still usable. We had another storm come through and bent the flagpole at the mounting bracket, so now it is completely unusable. I would get this flagpole again if I had an area that was covered or not exposed to the elements; otherwise it is a sitting duck.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful primitive flag pole
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice primitive flag pole. I received one as a gift and liked it so well I ordered a second one. Seems very sturdy and the star is a beautiful touch to the flag pole!
customer_reviews.author: jeepchic

customer_reviews.title: Looks absolutely awesome. Needs a little help for the actual flag holding portion.
customer_reviews.text: This was close to being a 5 star product. I had to fabricate some PVC devices to properly hold the flag on to the poles. It was a minor inconvenience for me.
customer_reviews.author: James Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for my wooden pole
customer_reviews.text: My wooden flag pole broke off in a storm so I was happy to find the metal flag pole which should withstand high winds, etc.
customer_reviews.author: betsy

customer_reviews.title: I'm very satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: As described. Seems to be holding up well so far. We leave this out 24/7 and no damage after ~6 months. Our flag does wrap around sometimes, so another hook down lower might help, but overall, I'm very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LAD

customer_reviews.title: BLACK FLAG POLE
customer_reviews.text: THEY'RE PERFECT FOR WHAT I NEEDED, GOT EM MOUNTED EACH SIDE OF THE FRONT DOOR
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Ruais

customer_reviews.title: Nice poll but not complete.
customer_reviews.text: I like the poll but the 1 hook and clip is a problem. Had to order the rotating flag holders to make it do what I needed. Should at least come with 2 clips.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald W Berger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flagpole
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was sturdy, adjustable and with a decorative finial. Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Kcb

customer_reviews.title: Well built and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: The good: It is well built, strong, and looks fantastic. The bad: Flags tend to get caught on the spikes of the star causing the flag to get tangled on occasion.
customer_reviews.author: R. Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality. Won’t likely last long. Doesn’t seem very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Waters

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pole!
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy, beautiful, and has a fleur de lis. What more can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: JSB Morse

customer_reviews.title: Glad to find!
customer_reviews.text: We have black rod-iron railing on our balcony where we wanted to display a flag. I wanted to match this, but so many poles are either white, bronze, or silver. We also didn't want an oversized pole, so I had to do some searching to find this one. So happy with it! The Evergreen Company that manufactures it makes flags to match the pole, and in so many color and design options. The US flag with embroidered stars is exceptionally well made.
customer_reviews.author: cbreview

customer_reviews.title: Stately & Proud!!!
customer_reviews.text: This flag pole arrive quickly. It looks very sturdy, stately, and very proud specially when Old Glory is freely waving and with the star topping the pole. It is as described, but much shorter compared to the pole that I currently have, but with eagle on the top end. I would recommend this pole.
customer_reviews.author: krazy_Papi

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty disappointed in this flagpole. I purchased this particular month because I am always frustrated with my flags getting wrapped around the flagpole and me having to go out and constantly unravel them. This flagpole was supposedly designed to prevent this. Unfortunately that is not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Roe

customer_reviews.title: Good buy but may not come as ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the fleur de lis ⚜ But received a star. It's a nice flag pole though so I'm keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: A.M. Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Does not include anti-wrap tube
customer_reviews.text: This is good quality and looks great. It would be a 5 star review if both the original and replacement included the anti-wrap tube that is in the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M.

customer_reviews.title: Pole is very sturdy and attractive. Holds a heavy flag with no problem!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to add a flag to the front of our house and found this pole on Amazon. I like the star on the end and the fact that the pole is adjustable. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Good metal, but poorly constructed otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: I like the sturdy nature of the pole, yet the pole was bent slightly when it arrived in the box, and the star connector is loose, and quite a cheaply made component. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Watts

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They’re sturdy and look awesome with the matching holders.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t extend
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful but can’t get it to extend no matter what we do. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Banner Pole!
customer_reviews.text: Great smooth finish. Banner slid right on, no problem. Nice little clip near the star to keep the banner from bunching up!
customer_reviews.author: PaPa Steve

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this along with 2 rotating flag mounting rings, as suggested. Our flag continually gets wrapped around the pole. We cannot use this flag pole. Tried to contact the sellers & got NO response. I will not recommend this. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: mamajo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy, and as described!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad that I persisted on my search to find this item. It's beautiful and seems to be sturdy and we'll constructed. I was desperately trying to find one for a new flag I had ordered, which has a narrower channel (barely 1") than most, to thread over the pole. I'm very happy with it. The product is definitely as described. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Nice flag but flag still tangles and wraps
customer_reviews.text: I like this pole but the clips that make it so the flag doesn’t twist and wrap don’t work. I’m constantly fixing my flag.
customer_reviews.author: Angie strickmaker

customer_reviews.title: Great flagpole
customer_reviews.text: Solid flagpole. Been using for several months now woth no problems and I like the star at the end, ot goes great with my Texas flag
customer_reviews.author: Pixie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but weak!
customer_reviews.text: Love the decorative star at the tip and the fact that it’s adjustable. However, nothing hold the middle when you do adjust the size. It’s weak. Came apart in the middle and blew down the 2nd day.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Hayn

customer_reviews.title: Great pole if you have strong winds..
customer_reviews.text: Great flag pole, where I live the wind blows often and strong. My last pole snapped in half due to the strong winds, so far all is good and the pole is holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Maria W.

customer_reviews.title: great flagpole!! inexpensive!
customer_reviews.text: This flagpole is durable, well made and easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to place along our main street in town. Easy to use, looks great. My only wish is that they provided the bottom clip for the flag so you didn't have to buy it separately. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: kd bowen

customer_reviews.title: Great looking flagpole
customer_reviews.text: I have only had it up for a few days, so haven’t really tested the durability, but I really love the look of the flagpole. It seems to be well made, so I expect it to stand up to the elements.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Very sad.
customer_reviews.text: Pole only can with one attachment for the flag... can't attach a flag because there's only one clip.
customer_reviews.author: Evan P

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent flag pole! The length was perfect for my needs and my new American flag. I mounted the pole on a previously installed bracket. However, in order for the pole to fit properly, be sure to remove the cap from the bottom of the pole. Almost immediately after installation the winds started gusting (and still are) but the pole is safe and secure. Highly recommend. It is heavy, well crafted, and excellent quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Janeen H.

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts only holds one side of the flag
customer_reviews.text: This is junk and missing the ring to hold the bottom of the flag
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weak star attachment
customer_reviews.text: Hollow metal pole is fine, star was attached with a screw that bent in shipping, tried to bend it back once and it broke. Overall I’m satisfied with the product, but not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

product_meta.title: Evergreen Flag Black Fleur De Lis Metal House Flag Pole 56"
product_meta.description:
Size:Standard| Color:Fleur de Lis, BlackAn elegant way to display your flags. This Black Fleur de Lis Estate Flag Pole proudly presents your estate size flag, our largest size flags, made for larger homes (typically around 36"x54"). A beautiful black painted classic symbol at the end turn this into an even more elegant introduction to your home. 

Make an impression! These beautiful, long lasting and durable flag poles are made with the highest quality materials. Providing you with a flag pole that's easy to change your flags every season is our goal.Not only are they easy to use, but they're made to last and last. Sure to hang your flag proudly in front of your home for month after long-lasting month.
feature_bullets: A STAR SHOWSTOPPER: Versatile and perfect for flag lovers, this black Star metal flag pole has a beautiful star atop to help your flag stand out.
QUALITY DESIGN: This pole is crafted from powder-coated, outdoor-safe, weather-resistant metal for long-lasting use. The decorative star finial adds the perfect amount of charm.
PERFECT FLAG ACCESSORY: Compatible with most house or estate-sized flag that has a top sleeve. 1" Diameter
ADD CHARM TO YOUR OUTDOOR OASIS: A seasonal flag is a great way to show case your personality and style. Check our selection for something perfect all year round!
A GREAT GIFT: A household staple with a touch of something unique. This will be a welcome gift for new neighbors, a house warming or just because!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars680 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
